input.sentences: an african-american crowd gathered to watch a cultural event .
two elderly people were dressed in traditional african clothing .
a woman speaker wore a dress with a matching head scarf .
a group of young girl dancers performed performed for the crowd .
two women happily addressed the crowd and hugged each other .
output.sentences: Everyone was gathered to watch the woman speak.
She was a very excited speaker.
Followed by some girls in the town doing a dance.
